## Focus on features, not ledgers. We've built one for you.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65cc6a98a3f52c92415dcb86/65de21e20dac668edfff39ad_bolt-solid%20\(1\).svg)
##### Blazing fast and highly available...
High throughput,low latency reads and writes with multi-region cloud hosting.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65cc6a98a3f52c92415dcb86/65de21f4ec94071e63f126d0_shield-solid.svg)
##### with safeguards and security, out of the box...
Double-entry accounting and immutable backups mean every share is accounted for—always.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65cc6a98a3f52c92415dcb86/65de220b8a5b47c597644c53_sitemap-solid%20\(1\).svg)
##### without sacrificing schema flexibility.
Create transaction templates, define asset classes, and add them to custom ledgers.
## Maintain a scalable source of truth without relying on just your custodian for it.
Reduce reconciliations against your custodian's daily snapshot files without ever having to become self-clearing.
[Contact us](https://www.nowhouse.io/<#get-in-touch-section>)
Create a separate ledger for your firm's IRAs, your firm's equities, or even your firm's emerging markets strategy.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65cc6a98a3f52c92415dcb86/65df8df076f373789dc022db_65cc6a98a3f52c92415dcba7_client%20avatar%201%20\(1\).svg)
###### Create as many ledgers as you need, for whatever you need.
Help your traders take informed positions with intraday charts that track their portfolio values down to the minute—no matter how far back they need to look.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65cc6a98a3f52c92415dcb86/65df8df076f373789dc022db_65cc6a98a3f52c92415dcba7_client%20avatar%201%20\(1\).svg)
###### Give your traders visibility through granularity.
Compute your traders' holdings from a single transaction history—whether it's their buying power, selling power, or withdrawable cash.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65cc6a98a3f52c92415dcb86/65df8df076f373789dc022db_65cc6a98a3f52c92415dcba7_client%20avatar%201%20\(1\).svg)
###### Compute anything your traders want.
Track exactly when your traders' funds arrive, from in-app deposits and ACATS, to checks to your custodian, to corporate actions from your custodian.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65cc6a98a3f52c92415dcb86/65df8df076f373789dc022db_65cc6a98a3f52c92415dcba7_client%20avatar%201%20\(1\).svg)
###### Track trade or funding progress in real time.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65cc6a98a3f52c92415dcb86/65df79e84b6f581652e1905f_Group%20289233.png)
## Rest easy knowing your transactions are audit-ready.
Let NowHouse keep your data compliantly recorded and securely stored—even when regulators and auditors show up uninvited.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65cc6a98a3f52c92415dcb86/65de2542cb6a87f0014d2e59_65cc6a98a3f52c92415dcb9a_check%20orange%201.svg)
###### SOC 2 compliant
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65cc6a98a3f52c92415dcb86/65de2542cb6a87f0014d2e59_65cc6a98a3f52c92415dcb9a_check%20orange%201.svg)
###### SEC Rule 17 and FINRA Rule 4511 compliant
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65cc6a98a3f52c92415dcb86/65de2542cb6a87f0014d2e59_65cc6a98a3f52c92415dcb9a_check%20orange%201.svg)
###### Built-in redundancy and failover

generated_description:
NowHouse is a cutting-edge fintech company founded in 2024, and it’s part of Y Combinator's Winter 2024 batch. The company's mission is straightforward but powerful: to help stock brokerages settle trades instantly. In an era where speed and efficiency are paramount, NowHouse is positioning itself as a vital player in the trading infrastructure landscape.

The firm operates from an undisclosed location—likely to maintain a low profile early on—and currently has a team that’s still taking shape as it builds out its operations. Jared Friedman, a well-known venture partner, is backing them, which lends some credence to their ambitious goals.

What makes NowHouse particularly interesting is how it combines traditional finance with modern technology. They're not just another software-as-a-service (SaaS) offering; they're deeply integrated into the user experience of stock trading. By focusing on features instead of just ledgers, they provide high throughput and low-latency reads and writes, ensuring that transactions are processed with blazing speed.

NowHouse addresses a significant pain point in trading by enabling instant settlement and reducing reliance on cumbersome daily reconciliations typically handled by custodians. Their platform allows firms to create multiple ledgers tailored to various investment strategies and asset classes, giving traders unprecedented visibility and control over their positions, including real-time tracking of trade or funding progress.

Moreover, compliance appears to be a strong pillar of their service. NowHouse is SOC 2 compliant and adheres to SEC Rule 17 and FINRA Rule 4511, which are essential for any firm operating in the finance sector.

In short, NowHouse is establishing itself with a clear intent: to simplify and streamline the post-trade process for brokerages in an increasingly complex financial landscape. This focus on real-time accuracy and regulatory compliance could make them a game changer for firms looking to enhance their trading operations. Keep an eye on them as they develop; they could very well shape the future of how trading is executed and settled. 

You can learn more about them on their website: [NowHouse.io](https://www.nowhouse.io).
